resources.string: - Use this screen to create events that you can keep count of the number of times you have done them (hereafter called Countables)
- On this screen you can also delete (via swiping away Countable rows), sort (via the menu icon) and reorder Countables (via the green drag and drop indicator at the beginning of the row)
- To interact with and change a Countable simply click on it
- Use this screen to edit the name of this Countable and modify and view your completions of this Countable.

- The Time Log section will allow you to see the dates and times you have completed this Countable event. Dates shown in green are times where you accounted for your schedule while red dates are completions you did not peform on schedule. Times shown in black are times this event was completed that are not part of your schedule.
- The Accountable section allows you to create a recurring schedule for this event to hold yourself accountable to completing.
- The Reminder section allows you to enable and disable a notification system to alert you to complete this Countable.
